channel.title: The Beers on Drinktober 2019

item.title: Day 31 - Drinkoween!
item.description: Bit of a spooky theme for the 31st of #Drinktober - it’s Drinkoween! Tonight I’m drinking Pumpking - evil pumpkin beer

item.title: Day 20 - Cuba libre
item.description: 30th of #Drinktober - only one more day to go! Cuba Libre tonight, another premixed canned job :)
